title: Why do people in normals get away with being afk
body: It's just the worst when you are trying and playing the game, either having fun or fighting to catch up when one of your allies leaves the game, and the worst part is that every time we report the player get's a slap in the wrist with a little .que pentalty, nothing serious.  meanwhile a text in chat can permaban your account, pick something people, dont just permaban one side.

replies.body:
they dont

if they afk , they get caught by leave buster and they get low priority queu

Well.

Leaverbuster is a legend, it works sometimes and it bans people who never disconnected from the game at any point.
you will eventually get banned if you keep on AFKing in ranked or normals.

100 minutes is a LONG time to wait just to get demoted into bronze 5000.
